repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:9.9-alpine

# Create app directory
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

# Install app dependencies
COPY package.json /usr/src/app/
RUN npm install --production && npm cache clean --force;

# Bundle app source
COPY . /usr/src/app

CMD [ "node", "." ]
